Equestrian Tourist Complex

Requirements

Create an "Equastrian Tourist Complex" consisting of a hotel and stables.

  • Choose a location for the complex;
  • The hotel and the stables should be no more than 200 metres apart;
  • The hotel should sleep 20-30 people and have:
    • a conference hall for 40-100 people;
    • a bar/resturant for 20-50 people;
    • an exhibition hall;
  • The stables should accommodate up to 20-30 horses.

    • Location

    Likani village, Samtskhe-Javakheti region, Georgia.

    Software used: AutoCad, Revit, Blender, Photoshop
